data.text: ―Trainer-san! Listen to this!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>―Trainer-san! Listen to this!

data.text:
One day, while walking around the school grounds, 
Smart Falcon ran up to me with a smile on her face.
data.processed:
<story>One day, while walking around the school grounds, 
<story>Smart Falcon ran up to me with a smile on her face.

data.text:
You see, this time, during the Sports Competition, 
Falco is going to be part of the Cheer Dance group☆
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>You see, this time, during the Sports Competition, 
<story>Falco is going to be part of the Cheer Dance group☆

data.text:
The 『Inter-disciplinary Sports Comeptition』. A race that's held 
twice a year at Tracen Academy, it's a big event that always 
brings in lots of spectators.
data.processed:
<story>The 『Inter-disciplinary Sports Comeptition』. A race that's held 
<story>twice a year at Tracen Academy, it's a big event that always 
<story>brings in lots of spectators.

data.text:
――Right! The one where lots of spectators from 
outside the school attend, that Sports Compeition!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>――Right! The one where lots of spectators from 
<story>outside the school attend, that Sports Compeition!

data.text:
If I can dance in front of lots of spectators, 
I wonder if they'll become Falco's fans～, Ehehe♪
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>If I can dance in front of lots of spectators, 
<story>I wonder if they'll become Falco's fans～, Ehehe♪

data.text: But, when I found her again as the day was ending……
data.processed: <story>But, when I found her again as the day was ending……

data.text:
Go- Go-, Fight O-…… 
Let's Go-, Fight O-……
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Go- Go-, Fight O-…… 
<story>Let's Go-, Fight O-……

data.text:
I was going to call out to her but, 
then I noticed she was talking to another Uma Musume.
data.processed:
<story>I was going to call out to her but, 
<story>then I noticed she was talking to another Uma Musume.

data.text: Haaa～…… it would have been nice to join the Cheer Dance, huh?
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>Haaa～…… it would have been nice to join the Cheer Dance, huh?

data.text:
Yeah…… never thought I would 
end up as a Flag-bearer though……
data.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Yeah…… never thought I would 
<story>end up as a Flag-bearer though……

data.text:
I have dirt aptitude, and flag-bearer aptitude…… I always get 
told that. If I want to get attention, then this won't work……
data.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>I have dirt aptitude, and flag-bearer aptitude…… I always get 
<story>told that. If I want to get attention, then this won't work……

data.text:
……It seems like rather than being Dancers in the Cheer Squad, 
they were selected as flag-bearers.
data.processed:
<story>……It seems like rather than being Dancers in the Cheer Squad, 
<story>they were selected as flag-bearers.

data.text: While I was trying to think of words of encouragement―
data.processed: <story>While I was trying to think of words of encouragement―

data.text:
……but, since it's already been decided, we just have to do our 
best. For now, let's keep on practicing!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>……but, since it's already been decided, we just have to do our 
<story>best. For now, let's keep on practicing!

data.text:
So just like this…… and this! 
And then…… like this, and this!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>So just like this…… and this! 
<story>And then…… like this, and this!

data.text:
The flag fluttered in the evening sky. Despite how heavy the pole 
looked, the flag was swung about quite nimbly. I could understand 
why they were chosen.
data.processed:
<story>The flag fluttered in the evening sky. Despite how heavy the pole 
<story>looked, the flag was swung about quite nimbly. I could understand 
<story>why they were chosen.

data.text:
After their flag-waving practice had ended, 
I decide to talk to her when she was alone.
data.processed:
<story>After their flag-waving practice had ended, 
<story>I decide to talk to her when she was alone.

data.text:
Huuu～, that took a lot of strength…… 
I'm so tired……
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Huuu～, that took a lot of strength…… 
<story>I'm so tired……

data.text: ―Waaah! Trainer-san!?
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed: <story>―Waaah! Trainer-san!?

data.text:
Uuu～…… I really wanted to show off the sparkly 
and cute dancing of Falco though～……
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: But, this might be a valuable experience
choices.processed: <size=41>But, this might be a valuable experience</size>

data.processed:
<story>Uuu～…… I really wanted to show off the sparkly 
<story>and cute dancing of Falco though～……

data.text:
……you think so? Even though it's a flag, 
do you think they might still think 『It's wonderful』?
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>……you think so? Even though it's a flag, 
<story>do you think they might still think 『It's wonderful』?

data.text:
―And so, with a little bit of anxiety, 
the Inter-disciplinary Sports Competition began.
data.processed:
<story>―And so, with a little bit of anxiety, 
<story>the Inter-disciplinary Sports Competition began.

data.text:
Go- Go-! Fight O-! 
Let's Go-! Fight O-!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Go- Go-! Fight O-! 
<story>Let's Go-! Fight O-!

<story>Smart Falcon stood next to the breathtaking dancers 
<story>while waving her flag. When she moved to the center, 
<story>she didn't let the opportunity pass―

data.text:
Go- Go-!! Fight Oーーー!!!! 
Let's Go-!! Fight Oーーーー!!!!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Go- Go-!! Fight Oーーー!!!! 
<story>Let's Go-!! Fight Oーーーー!!!!

data.text:
That flag girl is amazing……! 
She looks so enthusiastic!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>That flag girl is amazing……! 
<story>She looks so enthusiastic!

data.text:
Yeah, she's waving that flag so energetically……! 
It's almost like she's become one with that flag……!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, she's waving that flag so energetically……! 
<story>It's almost like she's become one with that flag……!

data.text: ……is what I thought, but―
data.processed: <story>……is what I thought, but―

data.text:
Ooooh-! The dancers are awesome too! Look at that pyramid 
they're making, normally you can't do something like that!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
<story>Ooooh-! The dancers are awesome too! Look at that pyramid 
<story>they're making, normally you can't do something like that!

data.text:
Waaa, you're right～! Everyone's got such bright smiles! 
So cool and so cute, I don't think I can take my eyes off them～♪
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>Waaa, you're right～! Everyone's got such bright smiles! 
<story>So cool and so cute, I don't think I can take my eyes off them～♪

data.text:
Haa～…… 『The way you waved that flag was amazing, 
and it made the dancers stand out!』 was what someone told me……
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>Haa～…… 『The way you waved that flag was amazing, 
<story>and it made the dancers stand out!』 was what someone told me……

data.text: ……as expected, it looks like the dancers won out.
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: But they could tell you worked hard!
But they could tell you worked hard!

data.processed: <story>……as expected, it looks like the dancers won out.

data.text:
But but, they won't remember my face! 
The only thing I'll make them remember is the flag～～……!!
data.name: Smart Falcon
data.processed:
<story>But but, they won't remember my face! 
<story>The only thing I'll make them remember is the flag～～……!!

data.text:
Even if she works hard, results won't show up immediately. 
The path to Top Umadol would probably be a long one……
data.processed:
<story>Even if she works hard, results won't show up immediately. 
<story>The path to Top Umadol would probably be a long one……
